name: Side To Side
description:
Side To Side

¡Immerse yourself in the incredible universe of Side To Side and let yourself be carried away by its dazzling effects according to the music!😉

►¿Why you will love playing Side To Side?

Side To Side presents a simple, fast and uncomplicated mechanics, guaranteeing agile and intuitive games. Get ready for a nearly impossible challenge by pushing your skills to the limit as you jump and blast your way through huge obstacles.



► ¿What does Side To Side offer?

🏆 Online ranking
(Get over yourself and reach the top!)

🌌 Good design with bright colors

🗺️ More than 20 levels with different settings
(Challenge your luck and test your skills)

🤷‍♂️ Difficulty adjusted
(Start easy and face progressive challenges)

🕹️ Smooth gameplay

🎶 Amazing soundtrack and sound effects
(Atmosphere and immersion guaranteed: wear headphones!)

🤗 And much more!

Get ready for a nearly impossible challenge in this game. Push your skills to the limit as you jump and blast your way through dangerous passages and spikey obstacles.

Side To Side is a complete package of fun, challenge and unforgettable experiences.
💚 Jump! jump! and slide!💚
